text.data-name: The Vision Center Group of Companies has built a reputation as one of the best eye care solution providers in Sri Lanka by using an innovative approach and state-of-the-art equipment to ensure that customers receive world-class eye care at all branch
text.tspan: The Vision Center Group of Companies has built a
reputation as one of the best eye care solution
providers in Sri Lanka by using an innovative
ensure that customers receive world-class eye
care at all branches. During our nearly 30 years
of operations, we have successfully become the
first company in Sri Lanka to bring the local eye
care industry on par with global standards. We
have also pioneered the introduction of the best
range of eyewear brands recognized globally to
the local market. Our high quality, high precision
contact lenses, optical and ophthalmic products
are available at all Vision Center outlets.
